paragraphs: Repositioning Volvo for the electric era required a delicate balance between honoring their safety heritage and embracing a sustainable future.
The new identity system maintains Volvo's iconic restraint while introducing dynamic elements that speak to their electric ambitions.
Every touchpoint was reimagined to communicate safety, sustainability, and Scandinavian design principles.

sections.label: Brief
sections.text: Create a visual identity that bridges Volvo's 95-year safety legacy with their all-electric future, maintaining brand equity while signaling transformation.

sections.label: Insikt
sections.text: Safety and sustainability are no longer separate values—they're intrinsically linked in the minds of modern consumers. The brand needed to evolve without abandoning its core DNA.

sections.label: Idé
sections.text: A refined symbol system that reduces the iron mark to its essential geometric form, paired with a kinetic motion language that represents electric energy and Swedish minimalism.

content.quote: This rebrand doesn't just represent our electric future—it honors everything Volvo has stood for since 1927.
content.author: Jane Doe
content.title: Global Brand Director
